Key.Original: You haven't eaten anything in awhile, You should find something to eat soon!
Key.English: You haven't eaten anything in awhile, You should find something to eat soon!
Key.French: Vous n'avez rien mangé depuis un certain temps, vous devriez trouver quelque chose à manger

Key.Original: You are starting to starve, you need to find something to eat otherwise you will die.
Key.English: You are starting to starve, you need to find something to eat otherwise you will die.
Key.French: Vous commencez à mourir de faim, vous avez besoin de trouver quelque chose à manger

Key.Original: You are now starving to death, you will die very soon if you don't eat something
Key.English: You are now starving to death, you will die very soon if you don't eat something
Key.French: Vous êtes en train de mourir de faim, vous allez mourir très bientôt si vous ne mangez pas quelque chose
Vous êtes mort de faim, c'est con...

Key.Original: You haven't drank anything in awhile, You should find something to drink soon.
Key.English: You haven't drank anything in awhile, You should find something to drink soon.
Key.French: Vous n'avez rien bu depuis un certain temps, vous devriez trouver quelque chose à boire

Key.Original: You haven't drank anything in along time, you should find something to drink soon or you'll start to die from dehydration.
Key.English: You haven't drank anything in along time, you should find something to drink soon or you'll start to die from dehydration.
Key.French: Vous commencez à vous déshydrater fortement, vous avez besoin de trouver quelque chose à boire

Key.Original: You are now suffering from severe dehydration find something to drink quickly!
Key.English: You are now suffering from severe dehydration find something to drink quickly!
Key.French: Vous êtes en train de mourir de soif, vous allez mourir très bientôt si vous ne buvez pas quelque chose
Vous êtes mort de déshydratation, c'est con...
